essentialCookies.heading: Essential cookies
essentialCookies.description: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use this service. We do not need to ask permission to use them.

heading: Cookies
intro1: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
intro2: We use cookies to make 'Record reprocessed or exported packaging waste' work and collect information about how you use our service.

crumb.name: crumb
crumb.purpose: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) token storage

userSession.name: userSession
userSession.purpose: Used to keep users signed in
